name: flx-compiler
description: A compiler to transform javascript to execute on the fluxionnal execution model
author: Etienne Brodu <etn@etnbrd.com>

scripts.test: mkdir -p results; multi='dot=- mocha-lcov-reporter=results/lcov.info' ./node_modules/.bin/mocha -R mocha-multi test lib/*/test
scripts.graph: for i in graphs/*; do dot -Tpng $i -o ${i/%.dot}.png; done;
scripts.graph-pdf: for i in graphs/*; do dot -Tpdf $i -o ${i/%.dot}.pdf; done;
scripts.compile: for i in examples/*.js; do node src $i -o results/$(basename $i); done;
scripts.all: npm run-script compile && npm run-script graph
scripts.clean: npm run-script clean-dot; npm run-script clean-pdf; npm run-script clean-res
